issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Fix the like function implementation for escape chars
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18235](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18235). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current conversion of sql like patterns to pcre doesn't work if the escape character is one of the special characters to pcre. Fix this by not escaping those characters if it the escape character itself.
